}}'''Philaerin''' was a [[moon elf]] and the Eldest of the [[Circle of Reilloch Domayr]]. He resided in [[Tower Reilloch]] on the island of [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Description: Despite Philaerin's age, his face was smooth and unlined.
document_data.History: Philaerin was slain in early [[1374 DR]] when [[Tower Reilloch]] was attacked. He died protecting a vault in the Tower known as Nandiyerron's Armory.
